# Sandblast, Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 180

*Whipping your hand in a wide arc, you spray sand from your fingers in a powerful blast.*

Creatures in the area take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. Any creature that fails its Reflex save is also [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round. You are not harmed by the spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *sandblast* to *lesser sandblast* to avoid duplication.
